definition: succession (of changes in an ecological community)/naturally evolving sequence
to develop/to evolve/to practice/to perform/to play/to act
to substitute for/to take the place of/to replace/for/on behalf of/to stand in for

sentences.english: The general rules of avian community succession.
sentences.chinese: 崇明東灘溼地鳥類羣落的演替規律。

sentences.english: But that of the fixed dunes is the contention between species.
sentences.chinese: 固定沙丘羣落的演替動力是種間競爭的結果。

sentences.english: But the total K decreased gradually in the whole process of succession.
sentences.chinese: 而全鉀含量則隨演替進行而不斷下降。

sentences.english: Serai process of vegetation on the sand of Zhanggutai in Liaoning province is from moving dune.
sentences.chinese: 遼寧省章古臺沙地植被的演替過程，從流動沙丘開始。

sentences.english: With the succession, the species diversity of the tree layer increased gradually.
sentences.chinese: 隨着青岡羣落演替進行，喬木層物種多樣性逐漸增大。

sentences.english: The biodiversity of the vegetations increased with succession.
sentences.chinese: 演替過程中植物的生物多樣性逐漸增加。

sentences.english: The innovation of Chinese philosophy has its inner logic and succession sequence.
sentences.chinese: 中國哲學的創新有其內在的邏輯根據和演替脈絡。

sentences.english: The succession and its mechanism of cotton pests in Xinjiang were summarized in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 闡述了新疆棉區主要害蟲的演替及其機理。

sentences.english: A distinct time related succession of insect community was observed during the decomposing of pig carcase.
sentences.chinese: 屍體上昆蟲羣落的演替有明顯的時間規律可循。

sentences.english: Remnant forest is as a result of forest regressive succession.
sentences.chinese: 殘次林是林分逆行演替的結果。

sentences.english: The quantitative characters of 30 community plots at different successional stages were studied.
sentences.chinese: 對不同演替階段30個羣落樣地的數量特徵進行研究。

sentences.english: M. thunbergii will dominate the community fur a long time from the point view of community succession.
sentences.chinese: 從羣落演替來看，紅楠將長期處於優勢地位。

sentences.english: Succession of forest community is characterized by the changes in community organization.
sentences.chinese: 森林羣落的演替是以羣落結構的變化爲表現特徵的。

sentences.english: Sejila Mountain alpine Rhododendron L. during the course of performing and taking the place of in more steady development in season.
sentences.chinese: 色季拉山高寒杜鵑羣落處於較穩定的發展演替過程中。

sentences.english: Interspecific association analysis is an efficient method to study the succession of plant communities.
sentences.chinese: 種間聯結分析是研究植物羣落演替的一種有效方法。

sentences.english: The community was in primary stage of succession, or was disturbed severely by outside.
sentences.chinese: 羣落尚處在演替初期階段，或羣落受到外界嚴重干擾。

definition: fourth period/quaternary (geological period covering the recent ice ages over the last 180,000 years)
Holocene (geological period covering approx 12000 years since the last ice age)
